'''Ageism''' is [[discrimination]] against a person or group on the grounds of [[aging|age]].
Although theoretically the word can refer to the discrimination against any age group (e.g. prejudice specifically targeted at fortysomethings), ageism usually comes in one of two forms: discrimination against [[adolescence|youth]], and discrimination against the [[elderly]].
In the early [[1970s]], [[Maggie Kuhn]] formed the ''[[Gray Panthers]]'', an [[organization]] with a goal of eliminating ageism in all forms.
Many groups have been set up in various countries to combat age discrimination, including: *[[United Kingdom|UK]] **[[Age Concern]] **[[Help the Aged]] *[[United States|USA]] **[[ASFAR]] **[[Gray Panthers]] **[[National Youth Rights Association]]
==Further reading== *[http://www.webster.edu/~woolflm/ageism.html An in-depth look at ageism by Linda M. Woolfe, Ph.D., of Webster University]
